data_center.context: Includes EPYC™ server processors and related data center products

drivers: Higher sales of EPYC processors to cloud customers
Decline in enterprise server processor sales

enterprise_sales.description: EPYC CPU sales to enterprise customers
enterprise_sales.impact: Lower enterprise sales due to softened demand

additional_data_center_products.description: Includes Pensando DPUs and other networking products

pensando_dp_us.impact: Significant ramp-up in sales supporting cloud deployments

networking_products.impact: Strong demand from cloud and financial customers

client.context: Includes desktop and notebook PC processors and chipsets

drivers: Significant inventory correction across the PC supply chain

ryzen_series.performance_improvement: Leadership performance in gaming, productivity, and content creation
ryzen_series.impact: Increased demand for Ryzen 5000 and Ryzen 7000 Series

am5_platform.impact: Supports the launch of Ryzen 7000 Series processors

gaming.context: Includes discrete graphics processors and semi-custom game console products

drivers: Record sales of semi-custom SoCs for game consoles
Strong demand from Sony and Microsoft for holiday season

so_c_sales.impact: Driven by demand for latest game consoles

graphics.context: Decline due to soft consumer demand and inventory reduction
drivers: Inventory, pricing, and related charges in the graphics business

rdna_3.performance_improvement: Enhanced performance and performance per watt
rdna_3.future_plans: Launch RDNA 3 GPUs with advanced architecture and 5nm chiplet designs

embedded.context: Includes Xilinx embedded products and other adaptive computing solutions

drivers: Inclusion of full quarter of Xilinx revenue
Strong performance across multiple end markets

aerospace_defense.impact: Record sales driven by FPGA and adaptive SoC products

industrial_communications.impact: Growth in wired and wireless customers, especially 5G installations

automotive.impact: Deployments of adaptive silicon solutions for high-end ADAS and AI features

vision_healthcare.impact: Increased demand for advanced compute capabilities

total_expenses.context: Operating expenses including R&D, marketing, amortization of intangible assets, and acquisition-related costs
key_factors: Inclusion of a full quarter of expenses from Xilinx and Pensando acquisitions
Higher operating expenses to scale the business
Amortization of intangible assets related to acquisitions

R&D.context: Increased investments in research and development to support product roadmaps

marketing.context: Enhanced go-to-market activities to support product launches and growth initiatives

amortization.context: Amortization of intangible assets associated with Xilinx and Pensando acquisitions

acquisition_related_costs.context: Costs related to strategic acquisitions, including Xilinx and Pensando

drivers: Inclusion of Xilinx and Pensando acquisition expenses

net_income.context: Net income not explicitly detailed for Q1 2023

eps.context: Diluted earnings per share for Q1 2023
eps.notes: Includes better-than-expected revenue and operating expenses

tax_rate.context: Effective tax rate for Q1 2023 and full year 2023

free_cash_flow.notes: Includes strategic investments and stock repurchases

cash_from_operations.notes: Reflects strong financial model despite mixed demand environment

share_repurchase.context: Repurchased $241 million of common stock during Q1 2023

full_year_2023.revenue_growth_year_over_year: Expected based on roadmaps and strategic priorities
full_year_2023.context: Led by growth in Embedded and Data Center segments

partnerships_and_adoptions: Dell, HPE, Lenovo, Super Micro production of new server platforms
Subaru rolling out AMD-based iSIGHT platform
Microsoft Azure launched Pensando DPU instances
MAX Plug Society's supercomputer in the EU powered by AMD
Collaborations with HP Enterprise, Dell, Lenovo, Supermicro
Adoptions by Microsoft Azure, Amazon, Tencent, Baidu
ecosystem_support: Founding member of the PyTorch Foundation
Collaborations with major cloud providers for deep learning frameworks
corporate_responsibility: Investments in sustainable technological and scientific advancements
Support for community initiatives amidst COVID-19

operating_environment_challenges: Substantial inventory reduction across the PC supply chain

executive_comments.ceo_statement: “We executed very well in the first quarter as we delivered better than expected revenue and earnings in a mixed demand environment,” said AMD Chair and CEO Dr. Lisa Su. “We launched multiple leadership products and made significant progress accelerating our AI roadmap and customer engagements in the quarter. Longer-term, we see significant growth opportunities as we successfully deliver our roadmaps, execute our strategic data center and embedded priorities and accelerate adoption of our AI portfolio.”
executive_comments.cfo_statement: “Our strategically important Data Center and Embedded segments contributed more than 50 percent of revenue in the first quarter," said AMD EVP, CFO and Treasurer Jean Hu. "For the second quarter we expect sequential growth in our Data Center and Client segments offset by modest declines in our Gaming and Embedded segments. We remain confident in our growth in the second half of the year as the PC and server markets strengthen and our new products ramp.”
